trans-unit.source: Specifies the resource consumed by the member of a class.
trans-unit.target: Especifica o recurso consumido pelo membro de uma classe.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute> attribute is applied to a member, the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute> attribute must also be applied.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute> atributo é aplicado a um membro, o <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute> atributo também deve ser aplicado.

trans-unit.source: If the resource scope of the consumed resource is different than the resource scope of how it is consumed, the constructor that takes a `consumptionScope` parameter should be used to specify how the resource is consumed.
trans-unit.target: Se o escopo do recurso do recurso consumido for diferente do que o recurso de como ele é consumido, o construtor que usa um `consumptionScope` parâmetro deve ser usado para especificar como os recursos são consumidos.

trans-unit.source: For example, a resource may be exposed as a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Machine> resource, but only used at the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process> and <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Assembly> scope.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um recurso pode ser exposto como um <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Machine> recursos, mas só é usado no <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process> e <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Assembly> escopo.

trans-unit.source: For this example the `consumptionScope` parameter is set to <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process> | <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Assembly>.
trans-unit.target: Para este exemplo de `consumptionScope` parâmetro está definido como <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process> | <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Assembly>.

trans-unit.source: The `resourceScope` parameter in the constructor must specify a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> greater than or equal to the resource exposure of all called members.
trans-unit.target: O `resourceScope` parâmetro no construtor deve especificar um <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope> maior que ou igual a exposição de recursos de todos os membros de chamada.

trans-unit.source: For example, a method consuming two <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process> resources and one <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Machine> resource would be identified as consuming a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Machine> and a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process> resource by setting `resourceScope` to <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Machine> | <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process>.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um método consumindo dois <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process> recursos e um <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Machine> recurso seria identificado como consumir um <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Machine> e um <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process> recurso definindo `resourceScope` para <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Machine> | <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process>.

trans-unit.source: `Public` members cannot expose <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Assembly> or <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Private> resources.
trans-unit.target: `Public` membros não podem expor <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Assembly> ou <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Private> recursos.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Assembly> members cannot expose <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Private> resources.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Assembly> membros não podem expor <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Private> recursos.

trans-unit.source: The graph of methods terminates when a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute> attribute with a resource scope of <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.None> is applied to a method.
trans-unit.target: O gráfico de métodos termina quando um <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute> atributo com um escopo de recursos de <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.None> é aplicado a um método.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope" /> for the consumed resource.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope" /> para o recurso consumido.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute" /> class specifying the scope of the consumed resource.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute" />, especificando o escopo do recurso consumido.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope" /> for the consumed resource.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope" /> para o recurso consumido.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope" /> used by this member.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope" /> usado por este membro.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute" /> class specifying the scope of the consumed resource and the scope of how it is consumed.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute" />, especificando o escopo do recurso consumido e o escopo de como ele é consumido.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute> attribute specifies a scope of <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.None>, then the <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute> attribute must specify a resource it consumes and how it consumes it, by specifying a value for the `consumptionScope` parameter.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceExposureAttribute> atributo especifica um escopo de <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.None>, em seguida, o <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceConsumptionAttribute> atributo deve especificar um recurso consome e como ele consome, especificando um valor para o `consumptionScope` parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The scope specified by `consumptionScope` should be less than or equal to the scope specified by `resourceScope`.
trans-unit.target: O escopo especificado por `consumptionScope` deve ser menor ou igual ao escopo especificado pelo `resourceScope`.

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process> scope can be consumed as a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process> or <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.AppDomain> scope, but not as a <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Machine> scope.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, um <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process> escopo pode ser consumido como um <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Process> ou <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.AppDomain> escopo, mas não como um <xref:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope.Machine> escopo.

trans-unit.source: Gets the consumption scope for this member.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o escopo de consumo para esse membro.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope" /> object specifying the resource scope used by this member.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope" /> objeto que especifica o escopo do recurso usado por este membro.

trans-unit.source: Gets the resource scope for the consumed resource.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o escopo do recurso para o recurso consumido.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope" /> object specifying the resource scope of the consumed member.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Versioning.ResourceScope" /> objeto que especifica o escopo do recurso do membro consumido.
